title: Furniture Type
content:
hey,

need some critique...trying to find the best way to show my type/furniture.  
Any radical suggestions? Below is a link to my site. I realize this isn't a web design forum, but if the lay out incorporated a typographic element i would be grateful.

[http://pauljamesbarbato.com/index.php?/projects/question-mark-chair/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116055419/http:/pauljamesbarbato.com/index.php?/projects/question-mark-chair/ "http://pauljamesbarbato.com/index.php?/projects/question-mark-chair/")

Also, did somebody recently post something about typographic furniture?  
This project may or may not be a good exmple?
